mapper.insert: insert into member_table(memberEmail, memberPassword, memberName, memberMobile, memberProfileAttached) values (#{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberMobile}, #{memberProfileAttached})
insert into member_profile_table(originalFileName, storedFileName, memberId) values (#{originalFileName}, #{storedFileName}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: select * from member_table where memberEmail = #{memberEmail} and memberPassword = #{memberPassword}
mapper.update: update member_table set memberEmail = #{memberEmail}, memberName = #{memberName}, memberMobile = #{memberMobile}, memberProfileAttached = #{memberProfileAttached} where id = #{id}
